JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: General Dentists, Public Dental Health Care in Dalarna, Sweden
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Om jobbet

Explore the Beauty of Dalarna

Dalarna is one of 21 regions in Sweden located in the heart of the country and home to approximately 300.000 residents. Known for its breathtaking nature, serene surroundings and welcoming community, Dalarna is a favorite destination for both summer and winter adventures.

In winter you can enjoy outdoor activities such as cross-country skiing, downhill skiing and skating. During the summer you can enjoy the stunning landscapes while hiking, cycling, fishing or golfing. All year around you can enjoy the rich cultural life in Dalarna. With excellent transport links to Stockholm and Arlanda Airport, Dalarna offers the perfect balance between peaceful living and connectivity.

Discover more about Dalarna here: https://www.visitdalarna.se/en

About the job

The Public Dental Health Care in Dalarna consists of 22 clinics within general dentistry, clinics with orthodontic specialties, dental hospital care and our own prosthetic laboratory. We recruit both newly graduated dentists as well as more experienced dentists.

We are currently looking for General Dentists who wants to live a rural life and provide high-quality care to patients of all ages, with a focus on children and adolescents. As a member of our team, you'll work closely with dedicated colleagues in a collaborative environment.

We are recruiting to the following locations in Dalarna:

Vansbro:

A charming small town in the western parts of Dalarna, surrounded by forests and rivers and ideal for those who enjoy outdoor activities like fishing, kayaking and hiking. The peaceful atmosphere offers a great balance between work and relaxation.

Malung:

Situated in the western parts of Dalarna and known for its strong cultural traditions and events, including the famous dance festival "Dansbandsveckan." Malung offers a close-knit community and a lifestyle rich in nature, outdoor life and cultural activities.

Sälen:

One of Sweden's most popular ski destinations situated in the north of Dalarna in our beautiful mountains. Sälen is perfect for winter sports enthusiasts. In the summer, the mountains transform into a haven for hiking, cycling, and other outdoor pursuits. Sälen provides an active and adventurous lifestyle.

Ludvika:

A vibrant town with a mix of industry and natural beauty, Ludvika is ideal for families and professionals seeking a more urban lifestyle with access to excellent schools, services, and recreational options like golf and boating.

Each location offers a unique lifestyle with the opportunity to enjoy Dalarna's natural beauty and local culture while building your career.

Your Profile

We are looking for motivated candidates with the following qualifications:
  • Registered dentist within the EU/EEA
  • EU/EEA citizenship
  • English proficiency at CEFR level B2 or higher
  • Strong references from previous jobs
  • Excellent teamwork and communication skills
  • Commitment to high-quality, patient-focused care


What We Offer
  • A 22-week intensive Swedish language course to level C1, preparing you for Swedish licensure
  • Education salary during the language course: 75 % of the starting salary.
  • Starting salary for newly graduated dentists is approx. 3300 Euro/month (before taxes). Salaries are negotiable depending on experience/competence.
  • A 1 year, contract during the language course and then permanent contract upon receiving a Swedish license as a Dentist (conditions apply). More information about applying for a Swedish license: https://legitimation.socialstyrelsen.se/en/licence-application/
  • Modern clinics equipped with the latest technology
  • Continuous learning opportunities, including courses and clinical observations
  • A minimum of 25 paid vacation days per year
  • A permanent contract conditioned with at least 2 years of service in Region Dalarna
  • Assistance in finding employment opportunities for your partner/spouse


EURES mobility supports may be available if you apply to this vacancy. Please check https://arbetsformedlingen.se/other-languages/english-engelska/eures-targeted-mobility-scheme-tms-sweden/for-jobseekers

In this recruitment we cooperate with Arbetsförmedingen EURES

How to apply?

Send your application to career@regiondalarna.se

Latest application date is March 31st 2025.

You can see the vacancy here:

https://arbetsformedlingen.se/platsbanken/annonser/29394586
